name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open Haiku Reader”
”Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to read me a poem”
”Alexa, tell Haiku Reader to read me a haiku”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
Haiku Reader reads random haikus out loud for users. A haiku is a short, simple poem with three lines. The first line has five syllables, the second line has seven syllables, and the third lines has five syllables again. 

Try any of the following to get Haiku Reader to read a poem:

"Alexa, open Haiku Reader for a haiku"
"Alexa, ask Haiku Reader to read me a poem"
"Alexa, tell Haiku Reader to read me a haiku"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
